original: a'arya pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta sha ta sa ha sra dh'a ra ni /
analyzed: a'arya pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta sha ta sa ha sra dh'a ra ni /

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines, the Noble Mother.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Mother, the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: tadya th'a / aom mu ni dharme /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom mu ni dharme /

original: s'a ra aa nu gra ha dharme /🔽bee shra @136a *//
analyzed: s'a ra aa nu gra ha dharme / bee shra @136a *//

original: na pa ri brta na dharme /
analyzed: na pa ri brta na dharme /

original: sarba k'arya pa ri pra ma na dharme /
analyzed: sarba k'arya pa ri pra ma na dharme /

original: sa manta aa nu pa ri brta na dharme sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa manta aa nu pa ri brta na dharme sv'ah'a /

original: aom pra dzny'e shru ti smri ti ma ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom pra dzny'e shru ti smri ti ma ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ prajñā śrutismṛti mati vijaye svāhā.

original: dh'i: dh'a ra ni sv'ah'a; aom pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a pa la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dh'i: dh'a ra ni sv'ah'a; aom pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a pa la sv'ah'a /
translated: Dhīḥ dhāraṇi svāhā. Oṃ prajñāpāramitā pāle svāhā.

original: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By upholding this, the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines will be upheld.

original: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one always recites it, one will become wise.

original: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All karmic obscurations will be purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines is complete.
